ability.name: Berserker's Call
ability.description: Taunts adjacent enemies and forces them to ONLY attack him for X seconds.  Gains bonus armor for the duration.

ability.name: Nature's Attendants
ability.description: Forms a cloud of healing that distributes to injured allies in a Medium area around her.  Persists after death.  Lasts 11 seconds.

ability.name: Battery Assault
ability.description: Mini-stuns and deals Magic damage to a random adjacent enemy every 0.7 seconds for 5 seconds (7 hits).

ability.name: Bloodlust
ability.description: Buffs an ally with increased attack speed.  Extra strong if used on himself.  Lasts 30 seconds.

ability.name: Marksmanship
ability.description: Increases Drow Ranger's attack damage and speed by a percent.

ability.name: Shuriken Toss
ability.description: Hits a single target for a large amount of Magic damage

ability.name: Walrus PUNCH
ability.description: Instantly hits Tusk's target with a critical attack and stuns them for 1 second.

ability.name: Hex
ability.description: Turns a single enemy into a harmless chicken.

ability.name: Sticky Napalm
ability.description: Makes Bat Rider deal extra Magic damage to targets in an Medium area, and slows their ability to change targets. Stacks with itself. Lasts 20 seconds.

ability.name: Heat Seeking Missile
ability.description: Fires 3 missiles at random single enemies, dealing Magic damage.

ability.name: Mana Break
ability.description: Removes mana from Anti-Mage's target every time he attacks. Deals 50% of the mana burned as Physical damage.

ability.name: Toss
ability.description: Throws an enemy to the furthest corner from Tiny, dealing Physical damage in a Small area where they land and stunning them.

ability.name: Arcane Aura
ability.description: Automatically generates mana for allies in a High range of Crystal Maiden every 2 seconds.

ability.name: Wild Axes
ability.description: Throws 2 axes that each deal Physical damage to every enemy hit, and make Beastmaster deal extra damage to them.
desc_levels: 60 damage per axe, +10% damage taken per axe
100 damage per axe, +20% damage taken per axe
140 damage per axe, +30% damage taken per axe

ability.name: Blade Fury
ability.description: Deals Magic damage per second to adjacent enemies for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Whirling Death
ability.description: Deals Pure damage to every adjacent enemy.

ability.name: Scream of Pain
ability.description: Deals Magic damage to all enemies in a Medium area around Queen of Pain.

ability.name: Illusory Orb
ability.description: Fires an orb forward a Very High distance, dealing Magic damage to every enemy hit.

ability.name: Paralyzing Cask
ability.description: Throws a bouncing stun between individual enemies, stunning and dealing Magic damage every time it hits.

ability.name: Corrosive Haze
ability.description: Drastically lowers the armor of a single enemy; reveals invisibility (currently irrelevant to Auto Chess). Lasts 20 seconds.

ability.name: Chaos Bolt
ability.description: Deals a random amount of Magic damage and stuns a single enemy for a random duration.

ability.name: Leech Seed
ability.description: Deals Magic damage every 0.7 seconds to an enemy, healing allies in a Medium area around them for the same amount each tick. Lasts 5 seconds (7 ticks).

ability.name: Waveform
ability.description: Morphling becomes temporarily invulnerable and jumps across the board, dealing Magic damage to every enemy he moves through.

ability.name: Moon Glaive
ability.description: Luna's attacks bounce to additional enemies in a Medium range, dealing 30% less damage each bounce.

ability.name: Nature's Call
ability.description: Summons an ally Treant to an edge of the board.

ability.name: Pounce
ability.description: [!!] Recently updated.  Need more info.

ability.name: Transform
ability.description: Transforms, gaining Max HP, and summons 2 wolves in close squares.

ability.name: Plague Ward
ability.description: Summons a plague ward with High attack range that cannot move.  The ward's attacks slow the enemy Attack Rate by 0.3.

ability.name: Purification
ability.description: Heals an ally, dealing damage to enemies adjacent to them

ability.name: Plasma Field
ability.description: Forms a ring of damage that expands outwards to a (Medium/High) max range, damaging every enemy it crosses over in both directions (hits twice).  Damage increases as targets get further away from Razor.

ability.name: Powershot
ability.description: Channels for 1 second before firing a line of damage forward, hitting each enemy it crosses.  Each enemy hit reduces the damage to the next enemy by 20%.  Releases when killed even if channel is not complete.  Damage reduces based on incomplete channel.

ability.name: Coup de Grace
ability.description: Phantom Assassin has a 10% chance to deal a strong critical when she attacks.

ability.name: Aphotic Shield
ability.description: Protects an ally with damage absorption. After it has absorbed maximum damage, or the duration runs out, it deals that much Magic damage to all enemies in a Medium area. Lasts 10 seconds.

ability.name: Burrowstrike
ability.description: Sand King jumps across the board, dealing Magic damage and stunning every enemy he passes through. Stuns for 2 seconds.

ability.name: Assassinate
ability.description: Channels for 1 second, and then deals Magic damage to a random single enemy.

ability.name: Metamorphosis
ability.description: Transforms Terrorblade into a powerful unit with High range and bonus damage and attack speed.  Lasts 60 seconds

ability.name: Viper Strike
ability.description: Targets a single enemy with a debuff that drastically slows its Attack Rate and deals Magic damage per second. Lasts 5 seconds.

ability.name: Requiem of Souls
ability.description: Channels for 1.7 seconds, then fires 6 lines out in hexagonal directions from Shadow Fiend, dealing Magic damage to every enemy it hits. Enemies can be hit by multiple lines.

ability.name: Laguna Blade
ability.description: Deals a large amount of Magic damage to a single enemy.

ability.name: Smoke Screen
ability.description: Creates a Medium area cloud over an enemy unit, Silencing enemy units and giving them a miss chance while they are inside it.

ability.name: Sacred Arrow
ability.description: Fires an arrow at an enemy unit on the enemy chessboard your pieces are currently attacking. Magic damage and stun duration increase based on the distance to that board. The attacking Mirana will fire arrows back towards your defending board.

ability.name: Doom
ability.description: Debuffs a single enemy with Magic damage per second and Silences them. Lasts 20 seconds.

ability.name: Ghostship
ability.description: Summons a ghost ship to a target point on the board that takes 3.1 seconds to arrive. Deals Magic damage and stuns when it hits the point.

ability.name: Fervor
ability.description: Every time Troll Warlord attacks the same target, he gains a stacking buff of bonus attack speed.  He loses all stacks when he changes targets.
desc_levels: +15 attack speed per stack, 6 max stacks (+90 max bonus)
+20 attack speed per stack, 9 max stacks (+180 max bonus)
+25 attack speed per stack, 12 max stacks (+300 max bonus)

ability.name: Illuminate
ability.description: Channels for a maximum of 3 seconds before firing a Medium size wave of Magic damage in a Very High distance forward. Releases automatically if killed while channeling.
desc_levels: 100 damage per second channeled (300 max damage)
150 damage per second channeled (450 max damage)
200 damage per second channeled (600 max damage)

ability.name: Death Pulse
ability.description: Hits every unit (including himself) in a Medium range with a slow-moving projectile, healing allies and dealing Magic damage to enemies.

ability.name: Refraction
ability.description: Grants Templar Assassin a number of instances of complete damage block, and bonus damage on a number of hits.  These buffs are separate.  Lasts 6 seconds.

ability.name: Chemical Rage
ability.description: Transforms Alchemist, granting him health regen and increasing his base Attack Rate. Lasts 60 seconds.

ability.name: Static Storm
ability.description: Creates a Medium/High area over an enemy unit that Silences and deals Magic damage to every enemy inside it. Damage increases as the duration continues; damages 4 times per second.
desc_levels: 100 max damage per second, 2 second duration
150 max damage per second, 3 second duration
200 max damage per second, 4 second duration

ability.name: Stone Gaze
ability.description: If an enemy is looking at Medusa for 2 seconds after she activates this ability, they turn to stone, stunning them and making them take 30% additional damage from any Physical damage that hits them.

ability.name: Elder Dragon Form
ability.description: Dragon Knight transforms into a dragon, gaining Medium range, damage, and special attack properties.  All Dragons retain the attack properties of lower level dragons.  Lasts 60 seconds.
desc_levels: +100 damage, Green Dragon: 20 damage per second for 5 seconds after attack hits
+150 damage, Red Dragon: 75% damage splashes to Medium area
+200 damage, Blue Dragon: -30 attack speed to enemies damaged by attack for 3 seconds

ability.name: Summon Spirit Bear
ability.description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear nearby.

ability.name: Call Down
ability.description: Calls down 2 missiles that hit a High area, each on a 2 second delay. Each deals Magic damage to every enemy in the area.

ability.name: Chain Frost
ability.description: Fires a bouncing orb at an enemy that deals Magic damage and gives them -65 attack speed for 2.5 seconds.

ability.name: Ravage
ability.description: Waves of tentacles burst from Tidehunter in a High/Very High area, dealing Magic damage and stunning enemy units hit.

ability.name: Midnight Pulse
ability.description: Creates a High area of Pure damage per second that deals damage to enemies based on their maximum health. Lasts 10 seconds.
desc_levels: Drains 5% of maximum health per second
Drains 7% of maximum health per second
Drains 9% of maximum health per second

ability.name: Remote Mines
ability.description: Plants a bomb that deals Physical damage in a High area after 3 seconds.

ability.name: Exorcism
ability.description: Spirits begin flying around Death Prophet in a High area, dealing 100 Physical damage to enemy units they attack at random. At the end of the duration, Death Prophet heals for 25% of the damage dealt. Lasts 8 seconds.
